discussion_comments.comment_body:
Resolved via a pnpm override.
Turns out that vitest doesn't pin to vite 5.0 so it can easily get updated to 6 when you're not looking
not 100% sure if we need this here, but seeing it declared in all our other relevant actions, so ¯\\_(ツ)_/¯
We do, otherwise turbo won't consider the OS part of the cache key

But, it is already here: https://github.com/cloudflare/workers-sdk/blob/9a804b9061006f2c2d508151d86246400055e4fd/turbo.json#L6

👆 isn't this sufficient?
No—that forces turbo to consider it, but we also need to make sure it's defined
damn.... sorry I read the comments and not the file properly... (I thought this was updating the create-cloudflare `turbo.json` 😂) yeah this is the yml file actually defining it! sorry my bad! 🙈
